summary: Argonians asked me to build them a home so I did. Inspired by Black Marsh ESO art and pics scoured from the tubes, I have created the perfect home cave for people who like to live in jungle swamps, but still keep their class. Unique features and display, beautiful clutter and textures, lots of storage.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________[/center][center]

[color=#a52a2a][b][size=6]:: DARKWATER DEN 1.0 ::[/size][/b][/color]
 
Mod adds an Argonian themed house above Darkwater Crossing (the mining village). 
 
[color=#ff8c00][b]Creator: Elianora[/b][/color]
 
[color=#daa520][b]Contributors:[/b]
Darkfox127 - secret door mechanism and scripts and magic
Nahkin: General awesomery, scripting and improvements
Lrsamways: Disenchanting font[/color]
 
[color=#a52a2a][size=5][b]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/b][/size][/color]
- Skyrim up to date
- Dawnguard DLC
- Dragonborn DLC

NOTE: You don't actually need to be Argonian to enjoy this house, it's great for any character who fancies living underground.
 
[i]There is a map marker near both of the entrances. [/i]
[i]The main entrance map marker is visible when mod is installed, the secret entrance has to be discovered.[/i]
 
[i]To know how to get the key, you need to find Derkeethus. He has the clue in his inventory. If you are too lazy or uninterested to [/i]
[i]go talk to Derkeethus, you can read the "hints.txt" provided with the download.[/i]

[youtube]saOgRTVqigs[/youtube]
 
[b][size=5][color=#a52a2a]:: SPECIAL FEATURES ::[/color][/size][/b]
- Mirror that allows you to change your appearance, similar to the Riften face sculptor
- Secret display hall that is hidden away. (If you cannot figure it out, the hints.txt will help) 
- Disenchanting font that lets you reset items YOU HAVE enchanted. It only works for player created items. It also resets smithing improvement (sorry, dunno how to change that)
- Display for all Dragonpriest masks and all claws, including the DLC items.
- Other unique display features (Gem paragons etc.)
- Custom Hist shrine (similar bonus as Kyne's Shrine)
 
[size=5][color=#a52a2a][b]:: GENERAL FEATURES ::[/b][/color][/size]
- Customised armour and weapon storages
- Custom kitchen storages
- Lots of unique models and textures
- All crafting stations (even DLC ones)
- Blacksmith Forge is an "All Forge", meaning it will craft Skyforge/Dawnguard/Stahlrim items
- Some mannequins and weapon racks (no plaques because those are so buggy)
- Navmeshed for followers, but no extra beds
- Bed gives Well Rested bonus
- Meticulously cleaned with TES5Edit
 
[size=5][b][color=#a52a2a]:: KNOWN ISSUES/CONFLICTS ::
[/color][/b][/size]
[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]- Incompatible with Vellamo
[/size][/color][/b]
Mod changes the names of these cells (previously called Wilderness): 
27, -14
28, -12
29, -12
 
And adds a few entrances/changes landscaping.
Also minor edit to cell 16, 4, which is a Dragon Lair.

- Mods that modify Derkeethus might cause problems with the note appearing in his inventory
 
[size=5][color=#a52a2a][b]:: CREDITS ::[/b][/color][/size]
- InsanitySorrow: Clutter and furniture models & textures
- Lilith: Ready clutter and catering
- TESA folk: Resource Kit
- NogZoiets: Svindall Estate textures and models
- Blary: Alchemy and other clutter resources
- Oaristys: Modder's Resource Pack
- Stroti/Tamira: Kitchen/craftsman items, smelter
- BrettM: FPI Project Research resource
- Tamira: New plants
- Berticus: Potion crates
- mrpdean: New Lakeview Manor meshes
- Langley: New high res textures
- tueffelachtein: Crafting table & upper class resource
- Artisanix: Paintings
- CD Projekt: For Witcher models
  L0rd0fWar: For converting them
- DarkRider: Celtic Decor resource
- Runspect: Resources for Modders pack
- Stoverjm: New Open Books
- The_Funktasm: Morrowind clutter & textures
- Angilla for the forest throne
- breti: New World Modder Resorce
- elinen/ztree/GKB: Tree and plant resources
 
----------------------------------------------------------

[color=#a52a2a][size=5][b]:: FAQ ::[/b][/size][/color]

Q: Mods in screenies? Recommended mods?
A: Every HQ texture I could find. Solstheim landscape and furniture by Langley. SMIM. Riften Hd by Langley. Detailed Rugs. Pure Waters. Seasons of Skyrim ENB. ELE. Relighting Skyrim. Furniture and Clutter - HD Retextures. Tobes textures for the counter.

Q: YOU KILLED MY POTATO WITH YOUR HIGH RES TEXTURES
A: Sorry. I wanted this house to stand out so the walls and floors use custom high res textures.

Q: The body with the key is REALLY not there.
A; Write [i]help "den key"[/i] to the console to get the item code, then use the player.additem with said code to give yourself the key

Q: I WANT MY FAMILY, MY 5 SERVANTS AND THE WHOLE OF SOVNGARDE TO JOIN ME IN THIS HOUSE PLS MAKE MOAR BEDS.
A: Not happening, sorry. I like small places, there are other mods for people who are more sociable than me.

Q: AUTOSORT!!!111 AUTO SORT DEPRH OEDGkdsöglk<sdöglKDGöSAJGÖL!!!
A: NO HERGBHGDGÖDSLGKÖ DSLGJSDLGJÖ! NO. Just no.

Q: I really cant find the entrance.
A: You gotta dive in and fight the current to find the entrance >:)

Q: YOU SUCK YOU ARE FAT AND STUPID AND I HATE YOU!
A: BRING IT ON!!!1111
______________________________________________________________________________

[size=4][color=green][b]:: UPDATE LOG ::[/b][/color][/size]:
1.1:
Fixes random cave pillar
Changes floor horn candle thing to a hanging chandelier

1.2
Fixes purple door handle for people not using SMIM
Adds moar fog to main cave
Adds hot water and steam to indicate it's a hot cave
Adds shelf and chest at the mirror for better Feng Shui
Fixes underwater floating rocks at the main entrance
Improves the look of the disenchanter
Adds storage behind the disenchanter (named for Scrolls)[/center][/center]
author: Elianora
